description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，陈独秀的长子。曾任中共广东区委书记、江苏省委书记及中共第五届中央政治局候补委员。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the eldest son of Chen Duxiu. He served as Secretary of the CCP Guangdong Regional Committee, Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee, and an alternate member of the 5th Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要创始人及首任总书记，是陈延年和陈乔年的父亲。
description.en: A primary founder and the first General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party, and the father of Chen Yannian and Chen Qiaonian.

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀的妻子，陈延年和陈乔年的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Chen Duxiu, mother of Chen Yannian and Chen Qiaonian.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，陈独秀次子，陈延年之弟。于1928年被国民政府杀害。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, the second son of Chen Duxiu, and the younger brother of Chen Yannian. He was killed by the Nationalist Government in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀之女，陈延年的姐妹。
description.en: Daughter of Chen Duxiu, sister of Chen Yannian.

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀之子，陈延年的弟弟。
description.en: Son of Chen Duxiu, younger brother of Chen Yannian.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的一所大学，陈延年曾于1917年考入该校攻读法律。
description.en: A university in Shanghai where Chen Yannian was admitted in 1917 to study law.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，陈延年曾于1919年底赴此地勤工俭学。
description.en: A European country where Chen Yannian went for a work-study program in late 1919.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪初中国青年赴海外半工半读的运动，陈延年曾参与其中。
description.en: A movement in the early 20th century for young Chinese people to study abroad while working part-time, in which Chen Yannian participated.

description.zh-cn: 一种政治哲学和运动，陈延年早期曾信奉。
description.en: A political philosophy and movement that Chen Yannian initially adhered to.

description.zh-cn: 一种思想体系，陈延年于1921年后转向信奉此主义。
description.en: An ideological system that Chen Yannian turned to after 1921.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，与陈延年、周恩来等共同创建中国少年共产党。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party who co-founded the Young Communist Party of China with Chen Yannian, Zhou Enlai, and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，与陈延年、赵世炎等共同创建中国少年共产党。
description.en: A prominent leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who co-founded the Young Communist Party of China with Chen Yannian, Zhao Shiyan, and others.

description.zh-cn: 1922年在法国由赵世炎、周恩来、陈延年等人创建的共产主义青年组织。
description.en: A communist youth organization founded in France in 1922 by Zhao Shiyan, Zhou Enlai, Chen Yannian, and others.

description.zh-cn: 法国的共产主义政党，陈延年于1922年秋加入。
description.en: A communist party in France, which Chen Yannian joined in the autumn of 1922.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。陈延年从法国共产党转入该党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China. Chen Yannian transferred his membership to this party from the French Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东地区的早期组织，陈延年曾任书记。
description.en: An early organization of the Chinese Communist Party in the Guangdong region, where Chen Yannian served as secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1925年至1926年间在中国广州和英属香港发生的大规模罢工事件，陈延年是组织者之一。
description.en: A massive strike that took place in Guangzhou, China, and British Hong Kong from 1925 to 1926, which Chen Yannian helped organize.

description.zh-cn: 1927年由中国国民党在上海发动的清党事件。此事件后，陈延年奉命前往上海重组当地共产党活动。
description.en: A purge of communists initiated by the Kuomintang in Shanghai in 1927. After this event, Chen Yannian was ordered to Shanghai to reorganize local communist activities.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的上海市，陈延年在此地被捕并遇害。
description.en: The city of Shanghai during the Republic of China era, where Chen Yannian was arrested and executed.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第五次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第五次全国代表大会
en: 5th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1927年召开的全国代表大会，陈延年在此次会议上当选为中央政治局候补委员。
description.en: The national congress held by the Chinese Communist Party in 1927, where Chen Yannian was elected as an alternate member of the Politburo.

en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构，陈延年曾任第五届候补委员。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party. Chen Yannian served as an alternate member of the 5th Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省的领导机关，陈延年曾任书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Jiangsu Province, where Chen Yannian served as secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府，于1927年逮捕并处决了陈延年。
description.en: The Nationalist Government of the Republic of China, which arrested and executed Chen Yannian in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 流经上海的河流，陈延年遇害后尸体被抛入此江。
description.en: A river flowing through Shanghai, into which Chen Yannian's body was thrown after his execution.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的陵园，安葬有陈延年、陈乔年兄弟的衣冠冢。
description.en: A cemetery in Shanghai that houses the cenotaphs of the brothers Chen Yannian and Chen Qiaonian.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期安徽省下辖的府，是陈延年的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture under Anhui Province during the Qing dynasty, which was Chen Yannian's birthplace.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年是陈独秀的长子。
description.en: Chen Yannian is the eldest son of Chen Duxiu.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年是高晓岚的儿子。
description.en: Chen Yannian is the son of Gao Xiaolan.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年是陈乔年的哥哥。
description.en: Chen Yannian is the elder brother of Chen Qiaonian.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年与陈玉莹是兄妹关系。
description.en: Chen Yannian and Chen Yuying are siblings.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年与陈松年是兄弟关系。
description.en: Chen Yannian and Chen Songnian are brothers.

description.zh-cn: 1917年考入震旦大学攻读法律。
description.en: Admitted to Aurora University in 1917 to study law.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年于1919年底赴法国参与勤工俭学运动。
description.en: In late 1919, Chen Yannian went to France to participate in the Diligent Work-Frugal Study Movement.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年早期信奉无政府主义，后于1921年转向马克思主义。
description.en: Chen Yannian initially believed in anarchism before turning to Marxism in 1921.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年于1921年后从无政府主义转向信奉马克思主义。
description.en: After 1921, Chen Yannian shifted from anarchism to believing in Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 与赵世炎、周恩来等一同创建中国少年共产党。
description.en: Co-founded the Young Communist Party of China with Zhao Shiyan, Zhou Enlai, and others.

description.zh-cn: 与陈延年、周恩来等一同创建中国少年共产党。
description.en: Co-founded the Young Communist Party of China with Chen Yannian, Zhou Enlai, and others.

description.zh-cn: 与陈延年、赵世炎等一同创建中国少年共产党。
description.en: Co-founded the Young Communist Party of China with Chen Yannian, Zhao Shiyan, and others.

description.zh-cn: 由法国共产党转入中国共产党。
description.en: Transferred his membership from the French Communist Party to the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年参与组织了省港大罢工。
description.en: Chen Yannian participated in organizing the Canton–Hong Kong strike.

description.zh-cn: 四一二事变后，陈延年奉命前往上海重新组织当地共产党活动。
description.en: After the Shanghai massacre of 1927, Chen Yannian was ordered to Shanghai to reorganize local communist activities.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第五次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在中共五大上，陈延年当选为中央政治局候补委员。
description.en: At the 5th National Congress of the CCP, Chen Yannian was elected as an alternate member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 陈延年于1927年6月26日被国民政府逮捕，并于7月4日被处决。
description.en: Chen Yannian was arrested by the Nationalist Government on June 26, 1927, and executed on July 4.

description.zh-cn: 继陈延年之后，其弟陈乔年于1928年亦被国民政府杀害。
description.en: Following Chen Yannian, his younger brother Chen Qiaonian was also killed by the Nationalist Government in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 在陈延年担任中共中央政治局候补委员期间，其父陈独秀担任中共中央总书记。
description.en: While Chen Yannian served as an alternate member of the CCP Politburo, his father Chen Duxiu was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.
